title: Banking
subtitle: We  are delighted to bring banking services to our customers
excerpt: Account Opening, Money Transfer, Money Withdrawal & many more service.
body: Business Correspondent (BC)

As a Business correspondents we are bank representatives. We help customers to open bank accounts, deposit money, withdraw money, transfer money, fix deposit, gold loan, personal loan, bike, car or home loan etc. We have partnered up with multiple banks to allow seemless flow for banking.

Bank of Baroda (Telco Branch)

ICICI Bank (Telco Branch)

HDFC Bank (Telco Branch)

Digipay

Account Opening

We provide our customers with the option of choosing from a wide range of Savings Accounts with different features and benefits. The Savings Accounts are designed to meet the banking needs of people from all walks of life. Each Savings Account offers unique features such as high transaction limit, cheque books, debit & credit cards etc.

Money Withdrawal

We help in withdrawing money to other banking patners with client permission.

Money Deposit

We help in money deposit to self, other banking patners with client permission.

Money Transfer

We help in transfering money to other banking patners with client permission.
bodyBottom: We provide extra services such as Gold Loan, Finance, Fix Deposit at good price, Feel free to reach out to us if you are in need any help regarding the above.

title: Government
subtitle: We  are delighted to bring government services to our customers
excerpt: Aadhaar, Pan Card, Voter Id, Passport, Transport & many more service.
body:
NISE COMPORT offers various Government services through the our Portal.
Below is the list of all such services:

Election

Aadhaar

Passport

Pan Card

E-district

ITR

GST

FSSAI

Election

To improve voter enrolment in Elections, we help the citizen to get there details updated or applying new Electrol. Also we provide various Electoral Registration Services through NISE COMPORT.

Aadhaar

We at NISE COMPORT provide demographic update such as Name, DOB, Address Correction. We do also work with CSC and provide the UCL service were we update Mobile no and other Demographics Update at our center Physically (Charges are applicables as per UIDAI guidelines)

Passport

NISE COMPORT provide Passport-related services through the portal or our center. Under Passport Seva, the entire form filing process, including payment of fee and scheduling of appointment for a visit to Passport Kendra, is done by us.

Pan card

To improve PAN services through either NSDL or UTI. We help in getting the citizen applying new or corrections for the indian citizens providing the valid documentation against it digitally or physically at our center.

E-district

The E-District projects intend to provide Government services to citizens through NISE COMPORT which are easily accessible. Services from different departments are brought under one umbrella at NISE COMPORT.
bodyBottom: We at NISE COMPORT provide all the above services. (Note: We are an private organisation who provides the services and make the above services easy and resolve the clients problems as per Norms under each category given by goverment).
